section.title: Leap.Unity.Interaction.NonKinematicGraspedMovement Class Reference

para.para: This implementation of IGraspedMovementHandler moves an interaction object to its target position and rotation by setting its rigidbody's velocity and angular velocity such that it will reach the target position and rotation on the next physics update.

listitem.para: void MoveTo (Vector3 solvedPosition, Quaternion solvedRotation, InteractionBehaviour intObj, bool justGrasped)
Called by an interaction object when its grasped pose handler has determined a target pose; this method should attempt to move the interaction object to match that pose.

section.title: Detailed Description
section.para: This implementation of IGraspedMovementHandler moves an interaction object to its target position and rotation by setting its rigidbody's velocity and angular velocity such that it will reach the target position and rotation on the next physics update.
